shapecode_0_border_g=1.000

shape_0_per_frame1=tex_ang=time+.1*q1;
shape_0_per_frame2=r=.5+.5*sin(.141*time+q2);
shape_0_per_frame3=g=.5+.5*sin(.267*time+q2*2);
shape_0_per_frame4=b=.5+.5*sin(.313*time+q2*3.14);
shapecode_1_enabled=1
shapecode_1_sides=32
shapecode_1_additive=1
shapecode_1_thickOutline=0

shapecode_1_num_inst=1

shapecode_1_g=0.000

shapecode_1_border_r=1.000
shapecode_1_border_g=1.000
shapecode_1_border_b=1.000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.000
shape_1_per_frame1=x=.5+.25*sin(time+0.9*q1);
shape_1_per_frame2=y=.5+.25*sin(time+0.76*q1);
shape_1_per_frame3=r=.1+.1*sin(time*0.27+q1*2);
shape_1_per_frame4=g=.1+.1*sin(time*0.36+q1*3.14);
shape_1_per_frame5=b=.1+.1*sin(time*0.48+q1);
shape_1_per_frame6=r2=.1+.1*sin(time*1.1+q2);
shape_1_per_frame7=g2=.1+.1*sin(time*1.38+q2*2);
shape_1_per_frame8=b2=.1+.1*sin(time*1.49+q2*3.14);
shapecode_2_enabled=0
shapecode_2_sides=4
shapecode_2_additive=0
shapecode_2_thickOutline=0
shapecode_2_textured=0
shapecode_2_num_inst=1

shapecode_2_y=0.500
shapecode_2_rad=0.10000
shapecode_2_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_ang=0.00000

shapecode_2_g=0.000
shapecode_2_b=0.000
shapecode_2_a=1.000

shapecode_2_g2=1.000
shapecode_2_b2=0.000
shapecode_2_a2=0.000
shapecode_2_border_r=1.000
shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.100
shapecode_3_enabled=0
shapecode_3_sides=4
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=dec=pow(.98,60/fps);
per_frame_2=num0=numbeat*(abs(num-num_att)+pump)+bnot(numbeat)*num0;
per_frame_3=pump=numbeat*(sin(t)*.1+.1)+bnot(numbeat)*pump;
per_frame_4=pump=pump*dec;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=num_b0=num_b;
per_frame_7=num=abs((bass-bass_att)+(mid-mid_att)+(treb-treb_att));
per_frame_8=num_att=num_att*.95+num*.05;
per_frame_9=num_b=above(num,1-pump)*above(abs(num-num_att),num0);
per_frame_10=numbeat=bnot(equal(num_b0,num_b));
per_frame_11=
per_frame_12=t=t+num*(1-dec);
per_frame_13=bc=bc+numbeat;
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=wave_r=.5+.5*sin(t*.36+time*1.2);
per_frame_16=wave_g=.5+.5*sin(t*.18+time*1.5);
per_frame_17=wave_b=.5+.5*sin(t*.29+time*1.6);
per_frame_18=
per_frame_19=q1=t;
per_frame_20=q2=bc;
per_frame_21=q3=1+sin(time+t*3+bc*0.2);
per_frame_22=q4=1+cos(time+t*2+bc*0.4);
per_pixel_1=zoom=zoom+.1*rad*sin(q1*.1+q2)*sin(ang*3+q1);
per_pixel_2=rot=(1.1-zoom)*sin(rad*3.14*4+time);
per_pixel_3=sx=sx-sin(y*3*q3)*(1-zoom);
per_pixel_4=sy=sy-sin(x*3*q4)*(1-zoom);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    uv+=GetBlur1(uv)*texsize.zw*8*float2(0,1);
warp_5=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_6=`    
warp_7=`    // darken
warp_8=`    ret-=.01;
warp_9=`    ret-=0.05*(frame%32==0);
warp_10=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_4=`    ret=lerp(ret,GetPixel(1-uv),0.5); //video echo
comp_5=`    ret*= 1.33; //gamma
comp_6=`    ret*=lerp(hue_shader,hue_shader.zxy,rad)*2-1; //mixed hue-shader
comp_7=`    ret=lerp(lum(ret),ret,0.6); //half de-saturated
comp_8=`    ret=pow(ret,float3(0.3,0.8,1.5)); //palletize
comp_9=`    ret*=dot(ret,hue_shader.yzx); //add some contrast
comp_10=`}
